content: As an optional secret boss, Yellow Loong can be found once you reach the end of the Middle of the Webbed Hollow, shortly after defeating the Right Hand of Buddha, and crossing its corpse.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Yellow Loong'.
The content is as follows:
As an optional secret boss, Yellow Loong can be found once you reach the end of the Middle of the Webbed Hollow, shortly after defeating the Right Hand of Buddha, and crossing its corpse.
